sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; export default function PhoneView() { return (

Neil Klein

T: (+1)(562)822-0995

E: neilk@mckassonklein.com

PARTNER@ McKasson & Klein LLP
Neil is a litigator and a transactional lawyer. His practice focuses on international transactions and disputes, maritime, commercial/business and employment matters, licensing, corporate formation and set up. Among others, he represents foreign and US entrepreneurs, manufacturers, suppliers, importers and exporters, vessel owners and charterers, P&I Clubs, container lessors, bunker suppliers, and several US ports and port authorities.
He handles maritime Rule B, C and D vessel arrests & attachments, bunker claims, charter party disputes, port tariffs, regulatory matters and creditors in major maritime bankruptcies. He also advises manufacturers, construction companies and related business interests on offshore wind farm and energy related projects, including US Jones Act compliance.
Neil acts for plaintiffs and defendants in charter party & bunker disputes, breach of maritime contracts, cargo damage and theft claims, personal injury and products liability defense.
He is well versed in maritime investigations, ranging from vessel accidents, collisions/allisions with docks and bridges, crane accidents, navigation claims, master & crew issues, death on the high seas, vessel safety, and dealing with the relevant authorities and interest groups.
He also handles matters involving US Customs and Border Protection, including notices of protest and appeals, seized cargo and/or penalties.
McKasson & Klein LLP®️ A boutique law firm established in 1998 located in Irvine, CA, near the ports of Long Beach and Los Angeles
); }
